descriptions: The student does not use technology to produce or publish writing.
The student attempts to use technology, but struggles with basic functions and the final product is lacking.
The student uses technology to produce writing, but does not take advantage of its unique capabilities.
The student effectively uses technology to produce and publish writing, incorporating some dynamic elements.
The student skillfully uses technology to enhance their writing, including linking to external sources and displaying information dynamically.
The student demonstrates mastery in using technology to create a sophisticated, interactive writing product that maximizes the capabilities of digital media.
The student does not include any external links or sources in their writing.
The student includes links, but they are irrelevant or do not function properly.
The student includes a few relevant links, but they are not well-integrated into the text.
The student integrates links to enhance the reader's understanding.
The student skillfully integrates a variety of sources and links to enrich the depth and credibility of their writing.
The student expertly uses links and dynamic elements to create a comprehensive and engaging experience for the reader, demonstrating a deep understanding of the topic.
The writing is unclear and difficult to understand.
The writing is somewhat clear, but lacks coherence.
The writing is generally clear and coherent, but could be improved.
The writing is clear, coherent, and well-organized.
The writing is exceptionally clear, coherent, and engaging, with a strong sense of purpose.
The writing is flawless in its clarity, coherence, and style, demonstrating a masterful command of language and technology.
